Container.Name: jellyplex-watched
Container.Overview: Sync watched state between Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby

Config.Name: DRYRUN
Config.Description: Do not mark any shows/movies as played and instead just output to log if they would of been marked. Change this to False after confirming that everything works as expected.

Config.Name: DEBUG
Config.Description: Print additional logging information

Config.Name: DEBUG_LEVEL
Config.Description: Debugging level, 'info' is default, 'debug' is more verbose

Config.Name: RUN_ONLY_ONCE
Config.Description: If set to True then the script will only run once and then exit

Config.Name: SLEEP_DURATION
Config.Description: How often to run the script in seconds

Config.Name: LOGFILE
Config.Description: Log file where all output will be written to

Config.Name: MARK_FILE
Config.Description: Mark file where all shows/movies that have been marked as played will be written to

Config.Name: REQUEST_TIMEOUT
Config.Description: Timeout for requests for Jellyfin and Emby in seconds

Config.Name: GENERATE_GUIDS
Config.Description: Generating guids is a slow process, so setting this to False is a way to speed up the process by using the location only, useful when using same files on multiple servers

Config.Name: GENERATE_LOCATIONS
Config.Description: Generating locations is a slow process, so setting this to False is a way to speed up the process by using the guid only, useful when using different files on multiple servers

Config.Name: MAX_THREADS
Config.Description: Max threads for processing

Config.Name: USER_MAPPING
Config.Description: Map usernames between servers in the event that they are different. Syntax: JSON map.

Config.Name: LIBRARY_MAPPING
Config.Description: Map libraries between servers in the event that they are different. Syntax: JSON map.

Config.Name: BLACKLIST_LIBRARY
Config.Description: Blacklist libraries that should be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

Config.Name: WHITELIST_LIBRARY
Config.Description: Whitelist libraries, everything not listed will be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

Config.Name: BLACKLIST_LIBRARY_TYPE
Config.Description: Blacklist library types such as Movies/TV Shows that should be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

Config.Name: WHITELIST_LIBRARY_TYPE
Config.Description: Whitelist library types such as Movies/TV Shows, everything not listed will be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

Config.Name: BLACKLIST_USERS
Config.Description: Blacklist users that should be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

Config.Name: WHITELIST_USERS
Config.Description: Whitelist users, each user not listed will be excluded from processing. Lists are applied individually, in an OR relationship. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple options

Config.Name: PLEX_BASEURL
Config.Description: URL of the plex server, use hostname or IP address if the hostname is not resolving correctly. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

Config.Name: PLEX_TOKEN
Config.Description: Recommended over username/password. Token is faster to connect as it is direct to the server instead of going through the plex servers. See: https://support.plex.tv/articles/204059436-finding-an-authentication-token-x-plex-token/ Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

Config.Name: PLEX_SERVERNAME
Config.Description: Recommend using PLEX_TOKEN instead. If not using plex token then use username and password of the server admin along with the servername. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

Config.Name: PLEX_USERNAME
Config.Description: Recommend using PLEX_TOKEN instead. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

Config.Name: PLEX_PASSWORD
Config.Description: Recommend using PLEX_TOKEN instead. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

Config.Name: Plex: SSL_BYPASS
Config.Description: Skip hostname validation for ssl certificates. Set to True if running into ssl certificate errors. Currently only applies to Plex.

Config.Name: JELLYFIN_BASEURL
Config.Description: Jellyfin server URL, use hostname or IP address if the hostname is not resolving correctly. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

Config.Name: JELLYFIN_TOKEN
Config.Description: Jellyfin api token, created manually by logging in to the jellyfin server admin dashboard and creating an api key. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

Config.Name: EMBY_BASEURL
Config.Description: Emby server URL, use hostname or IP address if the hostname is not resolving correctly. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers

Config.Name: EMBY_TOKEN
Config.Description: Emby api token, created manually by logging in to the Emby server admin dashboard and creating an api key. Syntax: comma separated values for multiple servers
